title: Add mobile number to global footer

requirements.summary: Display the mobile number "9973279335" in the global footer on all pages/states.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer shows the text "Mobile: 9973279335" on all pages/states (guest, customer, admin).
The mobile number is placed within the existing footer area (no overlap with main content) and remains readable on mobile and desktop.
The displayed mobile number exactly matches: 9973279335.

file_operations.description: Update the existing global <footer> to include a new line/item that renders exactly "Mobile: 9973279335" within the footer layout (under/alongside the existing footer content) so it appears across all roles and remains readable on mobile/desktop, without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
